sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Modal from './jobDescription'; const JobItem = ({ item }) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setModal(!modal); return (

jobtitle - { item.jobtitle }

country - { item.country }

salary - { item.salary }

experience - { item.experience }

visa - { item.visa }

jd - { item.jobdescription }

Modal Heading

Modal body..
) } export default JobItem;
